page.title: 12TOURISM IN PERTH
page.content: Perth is the birthplace of{GOLF}and boasts four magnificent courses in the city and at least thirty 18 hole courses in a 40km radius. Other tourist attractions within Perth itself include{glass-blowing}at{ {Caithness Glass,the Fair Maid's {House,two large parks _ the North and {South Inch}and {Scone Palace}which is the home of the Earl of Mansfield. Perth offers a wide range of accommodation. It has many fine hotels and it also has camping and caravan facilities. Tourism is a lucrative business in Perth because around{ninety thousand} people visited Perth last year and Perth's population is only{forty-seven {thousand.}The number of tourists visiting Perth each year is rising steadily. ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
